title: Delphina AI
heroSubheading: Automate your data workflow, generate insights, and build predictive models in minutes, not weeks.

features.title: Prototype new ideas in minutes
features.description: Don't waste time on infrastructure. Spin up a new model environment with one click and start experimenting immediately.

features.title: Make smart models together
features.description: Real-time collaboration for data science teams. Share notebooks, version control datasets, and track experiments.

features.title: Push models to production
features.description: Automated CI/CD pipelines for your ML models. Deploy to Kubernetes with a single git push.

features.title: Deploy instantly
features.description: No more waiting for DevOps. Delphina handles the scaling and monitoring for you.
